document.heading: Tobacco Product Manufacturer Reserve Fund Complementary Procedures Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-150, the “Tobacco Product Manufacturer Reserve Fund Complementary Procedures Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-406, which was referred to Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 6, 2004, and February 3, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 27, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-384 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-150 became effective on April 22, 2004.
